alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Maury (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 3:14PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lewis, west central Marshall, northeastern Lawrence, southern Maury and northwestern Giles Counties through 400 PM CST... At 313 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hohenwald, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Mount Pleasant, Summertown, Gordonsburg, Culleoka, Hampshire and I-65 East Of Columbia. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 29 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
